title: Descriptions: Color / Objects (Usefulness 2)
description: Traveler usefulness 2/10 phrases for the Color / Objects subcategory within Descriptions. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Japanese name stamps are a bright red color.
cards.romaji: Nihon no hanko wa shuiro desu.
cards.japanese: 日本のハンコは朱色です。
